title: Personality Trait-Based Learning Design to Enhance e-Learning Platform Sustainability

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Requires designing personalized online learning environments reflecting learners' personality traits and analyzing learning persistence. Applied to LMS-based language education programs for large-scale learner groups

learning_goals: Learners can explain personality traits (Big Five) that influence e-learning platform persistence.
Learners can analyze causal relationships between personality traits and platform persistence using structural equation modeling (SEM).
Learners can design learning strategies optimized for their personality type based on analysis results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
